itemDescription: teacher from England; winner of the 2018 Global Teacher Prize

wikipedia_page.main: Andria Zafirakou is the 2018 Global Teacher Prize British winner. She is an Arts and Textiles teacher at Alperton Community School in northwest London, England .

response: In 2018, Andria Zafirakou, an Arts and Textiles teacher at Alperton Community School was awarded the Global Teacher Prize 2018.
The 2018 Global Teacher Prize  was awarded to Andria Zafirakou, an Arts and Textiles teacher at the school.
| 2018 || Brent, northwest London,  || Andria Zafirakou || Arts and Textiles teacher ||
Andria Zafirakou is the 2018 Global Teacher Prize British winner. She is an Arts and Textiles teacher at Alperton Community School in northwest London, England .
